content:
{"name": " Salvation Army: Martin Luther King ( Senior Brown Bag )", "alternate_name": "", "description": "Other Services Offered:
* Energy Assistance-can provide up to $500.00 to Pepco and Washington Gas bills as well.  Clients will need to have a disconnection notice or be currently disconnected before we schedule an appointment.
* Rental Assistance-can only provide up to two months of rental assistance.  Call 202-678-9771 for more details regarding the program or 202-332-5000.
* Anyone experiencing homelessness or in need of furniture vouchers can reach out to Ms. Tanya Thomas at 202-984-7346. Ms. Thomas also helps with securing ID's as well.", "email": "", "url": "https://salvationarmynca.org/nca/gethelp", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "2300 Martin Luther King Junior Avenue Southeast", "address_2": null, "city": "Southeast Washington", "state_province": "DC", "postal_code": "20020", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 38.8629362, "longitude": -76.99121749999999}, "phones": [{"number": "(202) 678-9771", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "13:00", "closes_at": "20:00"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "ID required"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Seniors Only"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Proof of lower income required, such as your EBT card"}]}
